article_title: Employer Health Insurance: A Bargain Compared to Government-Sponsored Coverage

article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes

og.description: After years of slowing growth, employer health costs are forecast to climb at a faster pace next year, according to PricewaterhouseCoopers. Even with that projected growth, employers are spending much less per person than is the government -- about 60 percent less, concludes a new study from the American Health Policy [...]
